statements: SELECT sale_id, customer_id, product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT sale_id, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, city, country FROM customer_data WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, city FROM customer_data WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT id, customer_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customer_data WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sale_amount) > 5000;
SELECT c.customer_name, s.sale_amount FROM customer_data c INNER JOIN sales_data s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.sale_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT country, COUNT(DISTINCT city) AS unique_cities FROM customer_data GROUP BY country HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT city) > 1 ORDER BY unique_cities DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, orders.order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity_sold FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold >= 5 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT region_name FROM regions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.total_price, orders.order_date, customer_name FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, category_name FROM customers, categories;
SELECT product_name, item_price FROM products p, order_items oi WHERE p.product_id = oi.product_id;
